channel.title: Mobility on Yet another blog restart
channel.description: Recent content in Mobility on Yet another blog restart

item.title: Mobility notes from the bike camp
item.description: I was at a mountainbike camp in Finale Ligure recently. I don’t count the mountain biking we did there as mobility, let’s look at how I got there, what worked and what didn’t. mode of transportation I came by train and brought my bike along. Spatial constraint A corner that I cut: I didn’t check the small print of the train companies involved about the exact measures of bicycles that are allowed on the trains.
